Appendix C
==========

Data points for nearby sources
------------------------------

+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name              | Description                                                                                       |
+===================+===================================================================================================+
| portfolio_id      | Portfolio ID                                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| name              | Portfolio name                                                                                    |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| dec               | Declination of the event in J2000 decimal degrees                                                 |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_b             | Magnitude using the B filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_b       | Error of the B magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_g_lower       | Magnitude using the g filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_g_lower | Error of the g magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_h             | Magnitude using the H filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_h       | Error of the H magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_i             | Magnitude using the I filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_i       | Error of the I magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_i_lower       | Magnitude using the i filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_i_lower | Error of the i magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_j             | Magnitude using the J filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_j       | Error of the J magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_k             | Magnitude using the K filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_k       | Error of the K magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_r             | Magnitude using the R filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_r       | Error of the R magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_r_lower       | Magnitude using the r filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_r_lower | Error of the r magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_u             | Magnitude using the U filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_u       | Error of the U magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_u_lower       | Magnitude using the u filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_u_lower | Error of the u magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_v             | Magnitude using the V filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_v       | Error of the V magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_z_lower       | Magnitude using the z filter                                                                      |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mag_error_z_lower | Error of the z magnitude                                                                          |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ra                | Right Ascension of the event in J2000 decimal degrees                                             |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| redshift          | Redshift of the object                                                                            |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| type              | The type of the object                                                                            |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| url               | The SIMBAD URL of the object details                                                              |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Data points for telescopes
--------------------------

+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name              | Description                                                                                       |
+===================+===================================================================================================+
| name              | The name of the telescope                                                                         |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| altitude          | The altitude of the telescope in metres                                                           |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| angle             | The pointing limit in degrees                                                                     |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| is_24_hr          | Is the telescope available for viewing 24 hours a day?                                            |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| lat               | The latitude of the telescope                                                                     |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| long              | The longitude of the telescope                                                                    |
+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
